text: Carson Township is one of twenty townships in Fayette County, Illinois, USA. As of the 2020 census, its population was 108. It had 56 housing units. This township was formed from Bowling Green Township. ==Geography== According to the 2020 census, the township has a total area of . Of that area, (or 99.78%) is land and (or 0.17%) is water. ===Extinct towns=== * Twin Churches ===Cemeteries=== The township contains these four cemeteries: Blankenship, Reed, Staff and Welch. ==Demographics== ==School districts== * Cowden-Herrick Community Unit School District 3a * Ramsey Community Unit School District 204 ==Political districts== * Illinois's 19th congressional district * State House District 102 * State Senate District 51 ==References== ==Other websites== * City-Data.com * Illinois State Archives * * United States Census Bureau 2007 TIGER/Line Shapefiles * United States National Atlas Category:Townships in Illinois
title: Carson Township, Fayette County, Illinois
